# Widget Watch

> A free, independent real-time operations dashboard for Delta Air Lines flights. Built for the Delta community — not affiliated with Delta Air Lines, Inc.

## What It Does

Widget Watch tracks every Delta Air Lines flight in real time on a live map updated every 30 seconds. It monitors delays, cancellations, and ground stops at all 9 Delta hubs, checks which aircraft have Starlink WiFi, and provides fleet data, schedules, weather radar, and operational analytics.

## Features

- **Live Flight Map**: 600+ Delta flights tracked simultaneously, updated every 30 seconds via ADS-B data
- **Hub Delay Alerts**: Real-time delay counts, cancellations, and on-time performance for all 9 hubs
- **Ground Stop & FAA Monitoring**: NAS status alerts affecting Delta operations
- **Starlink WiFi Checker**: 258+ Delta aircraft with Starlink satellite WiFi — search by tail number or flight
- **Fleet Database**: 1,078+ aircraft with type, seat configuration, IFE details, and delivery dates
- **Departure & Arrival Schedules**: Real-time schedules with on-time stats and equipment swap alerts
- **NEXRAD Weather Radar**: Overlay on the live map showing precipitation affecting flights
- **METAR Conditions**: Current weather observations at all hub airports
- **Flight Search**: Look up any Delta flight by number, tail number, or airport code
- **Flight Watch**: Browser push notifications when a watched flight changes status
- **Hub-to-Hub Analytics**: Traffic flow matrix, top routes, fleet utilization, and airborne phase breakdown
- **Fleet Age & Delivery Timeline**: Visual fleet composition and new aircraft deliveries

## Data Sources

- **Flight positions**: Flightradar24 (FR24) ADS-B network
- **Delays & ground stops**: FAA National Airspace System Status
- **Weather**: Aviation Weather Center (AWC) METAR observations, Iowa State NEXRAD radar
- **Fleet & Starlink data**: Curated from public aviation databases and Delta fleet records
